Class AppCanvas

Namespace
ASE_Application_Demo
Assembly
ASE Application Demo.dll

Represents a drawable canvas for creating graphical shapes, text, and images.

public class AppCanvas : ICanvas

PenColour

Gets or sets the pen color used for drawing. Defaults to black if the provided value is invalid.

public object PenColour { get; set; }

Methods

Circle(int, bool)

Draws a circle with the specified radius. Optionally fills the circle.

public void Circle(int radius, bool filled)

Parameters

radius int

The radius of the circle.

filled bool

Determines whether the circle should be filled.

Exceptions

CanvasException

Thrown when the radius is invalid.

Clear()

Clears the canvas and resets the pen position.

public void Clear()

DrawTo(int, int)

Draws a line from the current position to the specified position.

public void DrawTo(int x, int y)

Parameters

x int

The X-coordinate of the target position.

y int

The Y-coordinate of the target position.

Exceptions

CanvasException

Thrown when the target position is out of bounds.

MoveTo(int, int)

Moves the pen to the specified position without drawing.

public void MoveTo(int x, int y)

Parameters

x int

The X-coordinate of the target position.

y int

The Y-coordinate of the target position.

Exceptions

CanvasException

Thrown when the target position is out of bounds.

Rect(int, int, bool)

Draws a rectangle with the specified dimensions. Optionally fills the rectangle.

public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled)

Parameters

width int

The width of the rectangle.

height int

The height of the rectangle.

filled bool

Determines whether the rectangle should be filled.

Exceptions

CanvasException

Thrown when width or height is invalid.

Reset()

Resets the pen position to the origin (0, 0).

public void Reset()

Sets the canvas dimensions and initializes the graphics object.

public void Set(int width, int height)

Parameters

width int

The width of the canvas.

height int

The height of the canvas.

SetColour(int, int, int)

Sets the pen color using RGB values.

public void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue)

Parameters

red int

The red component (0-255).

green int

The green component (0-255).

blue int

The blue component (0-255).

Exceptions

CanvasException

Thrown when any color component is out of bounds.

public void Tri(int width, int height)

Parameters

width int

The base width of the triangle.

height int

The height of the triangle.

Exceptions

CanvasException

Thrown when width or height is invalid.
